[03] 1^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^P0.0011^ea^ ^a^M0.0114^ea^ ^a^V0.0117^ea^ ca puggalo samayavimutto? idhekacco puggalo kaalena kaala.m samayena samaya.m a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa {phassitvaa (sii0 pii0)} viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``samayavimutto''.

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo asamayavimutto? idhekacco puggalo na ^a^T0.0141^ea^ heva kho kaalena kaala.m samayena samaya.m a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``asamayavimutto''. sabbepi ariyapuggalaa ariye vimokkhe asamayavimuttaa.

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo kuppadhammo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho na nikaamalaabhii hoti na akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii; na yatthicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m tassa puggalassa pamaadamaagamma taa samaapattiyo kuppeyyu.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``kuppadhammo''.

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo akuppadhammo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; yatthicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ^a^V0.0118^ea^ ya.m tassa puggalassa pamaadamaagamma taa samaapattiyo kuppeyyu.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``akuppadhammo''. sabbepi ariyapuggalaa ariye vimokkhe akuppadhammaa.

[03] 5^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo parihaanadhammo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m ^a^P0.0012^ea^ vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho na nikaamalaabhii hoti na akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii; na ^a^M0.0115^ea^ yatthicchaka.m ^a^T0.0142^ea^ yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. .thaana.m kho paneta.m vijjati, ya.m so puggalo pamaadamaagamma taahi samaapattiihi parihaayeyya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``parihaanadhammo''.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo aparihaanadhammo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho nikaamalaabhii hoti akicchalaabhii akasiralaabhii; yatthicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. a.t.thaanameta.m anavakaaso ya.m so puggalo pamaadamaagamma taahi samaapattiihi parihaayeyya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``aparihaanadhammo''. sabbepi ariyapuggalaa ariye vimokkhe aparihaanadhammaa.

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo cetanaabhabbo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho na nikaamalaabhii hoti na akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii; na yatthicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. sace anusa~nceteti, na parihaayati taahi samaapattiihi. sace na anusa~nceteti, parihaayati taahi samaapattiihi -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``cetanaabhabbo''.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo anurakkha.naabhabbo? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. so ca kho na nikaamalaabhii hoti na akicchalaabhii na akasiralaabhii; na yatthicchaka.m yadicchaka.m yaavaticchaka.m samaapajjatipi vu.t.thaatipi. sace anurakkhati, na ^a^T0.0143^ea^ parihaayati taahi samaapattiihi. sace na anurakkhati, parihaayati taahi samaapattiihi -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anurakkha.naabhabbo''.
[03] 9^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0119^ea^ ca puggalo puthujjano? yassa puggalassa tii.ni sa.myojanaani appahiinaani; na ca tesa.m dhammaana.m pahaanaaya pa.tipanno -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``puthujjano''.
[03] 10^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo gotrabhuu? yesa.m ^a^P0.0013^ea^ dhammaana.m samanantaraa ariyadhammassa avakkanti hoti tehi dhammehi samannaagato -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``gotrabhuu''.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0116^ea^ ca puggalo bhayuuparato? satta sekkhaa bhayuuparataa, ye ca puthujjanaa siilavanto. arahaa abhayuuparato.

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo abhabbaagamano? ye te puggalaa kammaavara.nena samannaagataa, kilesaavara.nena samannaagataa, vipaakaavara.nena samannaagataa, assaddhaa acchandikaa duppa~n~naa e.laa, abhabbaa niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m -- ime vuccanti puggalaa ``abhabbaagamanaa''.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo bhabbaagamano? ye te puggalaa na kammaavara.nena samannaagataa, na kilesaavara.nena samannaagataa, na vipaakaavara.nena samannaagataa, saddhaa chandikaa pa~n~navanto {pa~n~navantaa (sii0)} ane.laa, bhabbaa niyaama.m okkamitu.m kusalesu dhammesu sammatta.m -- ime vuccanti puggalaa ``bhabbaagamanaa''.
[03] 14^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^T0.0144^ea^ ca puggalo niyato? pa~nca puggalaa aanantarikaa, ye ca micchaadi.t.thikaa niyataa, a.t.tha ca ariyapuggalaa niyataa. avasesaa puggalaa aniyataa.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo pa.tipannako? cattaaro maggasama"ngino puggalaa pa.tipannakaa, cattaaro phalasama"ngino puggalaa phale .thitaa.
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo samasiisii? yassa puggalassa apubba.m acarima.m aasavapariyaadaana~nca hoti jiivitapariyaadaana~nca -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``samasiisii''.

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0120^ea^ ca puggalo .thitakappii? aya~nca puggalo sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno assa, kappassa ca u.d.dayhanavelaa assa, neva taava kappo u.d.dayheyya yaavaaya.m puggalo na sotaapattiphala.m sacchikaroti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``.thitakappii''. sabbepi ^a^P0.0014^ea^ maggasama"ngino puggalaa .thitakappino.
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ariyo? a.t.tha ariyapuggalaa ariyaa. avasesaa puggalaa anariyaa.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0117^ea^ ca puggalo sekkho? cattaaro maggasama"ngino tayo phalasama"ngino puggalaa ``sekkhaa''. arahaa asekkho. avasesaa puggalaa nevasekkhanaasekkhaa.
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo tevijjo? tiihi vijjaahi samannaagato puggalo ^a^T0.0145^ea^ ``tevijjo''.
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo cha.labhi~n~no? chahi abhi~n~naahi samannaagato puggalo ``cha.labhi~n~no''.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sammaasambuddho? idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu saama.m saccaani abhisambujjhati; tattha ca sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.naati, balesu ca vasiibhaava.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sammaasambuddho''.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo paccekasambuddho? idhekacco puggalo pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu saama.m saccaani abhisambujjhati; na ca tattha sabba~n~nuta.m paapu.naati, na ca balesu vasiibhaava.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``paccekasambuddho''.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ubhatobhaagavimutto? idhekacco puggalo a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati; pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``ubhatobhaagavimutto''.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0121^ea^ ca puggalo pa~n~naavimutto? idhekacco puggalo na heva kho a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati; pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``pa~n~naavimutto''.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo kaayasakkhii? idhekacco puggalo a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati ^a^P0.0015^ea^; pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce ^a^T0.0146^ea^ aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``kaayasakkhii''.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo di.t.thippatto? idhekacco puggalo ``ida.m dukkha''nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tathaagatappaveditaa cassa ^a^M0.0118^ea^ dhammaa pa~n~naaya vodi.t.thaa honti vocaritaa. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``di.t.thippatto''.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo saddhaavimutto? idhekacco puggalo ``ida.m dukkha''nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati. tathaagatappaveditaa cassa dhammaa pa~n~naaya vodi.t.thaa honti vocaritaa. pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti, no ca kho yathaa di.t.thippattassa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``saddhaavimutto''.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo dhammaanusaarii? yassa puggalassa sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipannassa pa~n~nindriya.m adhimatta.m hoti, pa~n~naavaahi.m pa~n~naapubba"ngama.m ariyamagga.m bhaaveti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``dhammaanusaarii''. sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno puggalo dhammaanusaarii phale .thito di.t.thippatto.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^T0.0147^ea^ ca puggalo saddhaanusaarii? yassa puggalassa sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipannassa saddhindriya.m adhimatta.m hoti, saddhaavaahi.m saddhaapubba"ngama.m ariyamagga.m bhaaveti -- aya.m vuccati ^a^V0.0122^ea^ puggalo ``saddhaanusaarii''. sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno puggalo saddhaanusaarii phale .thito saddhaavimutto.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sattakkhattuparamo? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno ^a^P0.0016^ea^ hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaayano {sambodhiparaaya.no (sii0 ka0)}. so sattakkhattu.m deve ca maanuse ca sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sattakkhattuparamo''.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo kola"nkolo? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato ^a^M0.0119^ea^ sambodhiparaayano. so dve vaa tii.ni vaa kulaani sandhaavitvaa sa.msaritvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``kola"nkolo''.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ekabiijii? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaayano. so eka.myeva maanusaka.m bhava.m nibbattetvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``ekabiijii''.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sakadaagaamii? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti ^a^T0.0148^ea^, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sakadaagaamii''.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo anaagaamii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anaagaamii''.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo antaraaparinibbaayii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. so upapanna.m vaa samanantaraa appatta.m vaa vemajjha.m aayuppamaa.na.m ariyamagga.m sa~njaneti upari.t.thimaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``antaraaparinibbaayii''.

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0123^ea^ ca puggalo upahaccaparinibbaayii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m ^a^P0.0017^ea^ parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. so atikkamitvaa vemajjha.m aayuppamaa.na.m upahacca vaa kaalakiriya.m {kaala.m kiriya.m (ka0)} ariyamagga.m sa~njaneti upari.t.thimaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``upahaccaparinibbaayii''.

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha ^a^T0.0149^ea^ parinibbaayii ^a^M0.0120^ea^ anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. so asa"nkhaarena ariyamagga.m sa~njaneti upari.t.thimaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``asa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii''.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. so sasa"nkhaarena ariyamagga.m sa~njaneti upari.t.thimaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sasa"nkhaaraparinibbaayii''.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo uddha.msoto akani.t.thagaamii? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti, tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. so avihaa cuto atappa.m gacchati, atappaa cuto sudassa.m gacchati, sudassaa cuto sudassi.m gacchati, sudassiyaa cuto akani.t.tha.m gacchati; akani.t.the ariyamagga.m sa~njaneti upari.t.thimaana.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``uddha.msoto akani.t.thagaamii''.

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sotaapanno sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno? ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m pahaanaaya pa.tipanno puggalo sotaapattiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno. yassa puggalassa tii.ni sa.myojanaani pahiinaani -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sotaapanno''.

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m tanubhaavaaya pa.tipanno puggalo sakadaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno ^a^V0.0124^ea^. yassa ^a^T0.0150^ea^ puggalassa kaamaraagabyaapaadaa tanubhuutaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sakadaagaamii''.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ kaamaraagabyaapaadaana.m anavasesappahaanaaya pa.tipanno puggalo ^a^P0.0018^ea^ anaagaamiphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno. yassa puggalassa kaamaraagabyaapaadaa anavasesaa pahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anaagaamii''.

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ ruuparaagaaruuparaagamaanauddhaccaavijjaaya anavasesappahaanaaya pa.tipanno puggalo arahattaphalasacchikiriyaaya pa.tipanno. yassa puggalassa ruuparaago ^a^M0.0121^ea^ aruuparaago maano uddhacca.m avijjaa anavasesaa pahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``arahaa''.
[06] ekakaniddeso.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo kodhano? tattha katamo kodho? yo kodho kujjhanaa kujjhitatta.m doso dussanaa dussitatta.m {duusanaa duusitatta.m (syaa0)} byaapatti byaapajjanaa byaapajjitatta.m virodho pa.tivirodho ca.n.dikka.m asuropo anattamanataa cittassa -- aya.m vuccati kodho. yassa puggalassa aya.m kodho appahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``kodhano''.

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo upanaahii? tattha katamo upanaaho? pubbakaala.m kodho aparakaala.m upanaaho. yo evaruupo upanaaho upanayhanaa upanayhitatta.m a.t.thapanaa {aa.thapanaa (ka0) vibha0 891} .thapanaa sa.n.thapanaa anusa.msandanaa anuppabandhanaa da.lhiikamma.m kodhassa -- aya.m vuccati upanaaho ^a^T0.0151^ea^. yassa puggalassa aya.m upanaaho appahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``upanaahii''.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo makkhii? tattha katamo makkho? yo makkho makkhaayanaa makkhaayitatta.m {makkhiiyanaa makkhiiyitatta.m (sii0), makkhiyanaa makkhiyitatta.m (ka0)} ^a^V0.0125^ea^ ni.t.thuriya.m ni.t.thuriyakamma.m -- aya.m vuccati makkho. yassa puggalassa aya.m makkho appahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``makkhii''.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo pa.laasii? tattha katamo pa.laaso? yo pa.laaso pa.laasaayanaa pa.laasaayitatta.m ^a^P0.0019^ea^ pa.laasaahaaro vivaada.t.thaana.m yugaggaaho appa.tinissaggo -- aya.m vuccati pa.laaso. yassa puggalassa aya.m pa.laaso appahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``pa.laasii''.

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0122^ea^ ca puggalo issukii? tattha katamaa issaa? yaa paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu issaa issaayanaa issaayitatta.m usuuyaa usuuyanaa {ussuyaa ussuyanaa (ka0) vibha0 893} usuuyitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati issaa. yassa puggalassa aya.m issaa appahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``issukii''.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo maccharii? tattha katama.m macchariya.m? pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m. ya.m evaruupa.m macchera.m maccharaayanaa maccharaayitatta.m veviccha.m kadariya.m ka.tuka~ncukataa aggahitatta.m cittassa -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. yassa puggalassa ida.m macchariya.m appahiina.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``maccharii''.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sa.tho? tattha katama.m saa.theyya.m? idhekacco sa.tho hoti parisa.tho. ya.m tattha sa.tha.m sa.thataa saa.theyya.m ^a^T0.0152^ea^ kakkarataa kakkariya.m {kakkha.lataa kakkha.liya.m (syaa0) eva.m khuddakavibha"ngadukaniddesepi} parikkhattattaa paarikkhattiya.m -- ida.m vuccati saa.theyya.m. yassa puggalassa ida.m saa.theyya.m appahiina.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sa.tho''.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo maayaavii? tattha katamaa maayaa? idhekacco kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa tassa pa.ticchaadanahetu paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahati -- ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti icchati, ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti sa"nkappati ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti vaaca.m bhaasati, ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti kaayena parakkamati. yaa evaruupaa maayaa maayaavitaa accaasaraa va~ncanaa nikati vikira.naa parihara.naa guuhanaa pariguuhanaa chaadanaa pa.ticchaadanaa ^a^V0.0126^ea^ anuttaaniikamma.m anaavikamma.m vocchaadanaa paapakiriyaa -- aya.m vuccati maayaa. yassa puggalassa aya.m maayaa appahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``maayaavii''.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ahiriko? tattha katama.m ahirika.m? ya.m ^a^P0.0020^ea^ na hiriiyati hiriyitabbena na hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m vuccati ahirika.m. iminaa ahirikena samannaagato puggalo ``ahiriko''.

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0123^ea^ ca puggalo anottappii? tattha katama.m anottappa.m? ya.m na ottappati ottappitabbena na ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m vuccati anottappa.m. iminaa anottappena samannaagato puggalo ``anottappii''.

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo dubbaco? tattha katamo dovacassataa? sahadhammike vuccamaane dovacassaaya.m dovacassiya.m dovacassataa vippa.tikulaggaahitaa ^a^T0.0153^ea^ vipaccaniikasaatataa anaadariya.m anaadariyataa agaaravataa appatissavataa -- aya.m vuccati dovacassataa. imaaya dovacassataaya samannaagato puggalo ``dubbaco''.

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo paapamitto? tattha katamaa paapamittataa? ye te puggalaa assaddhaa dussiilaa appassutaa maccharino duppa~n~naa, yaa tesa.m sevanaa nisevanaa sa.msevanaa bhajanaa sambhajanaa bhatti sambhatti sampava"nkataa -- aya.m vuccati paapamittataa. imaaya paapamittataaya samannaagato puggalo ``paapamitto''.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo indriyesu aguttadvaaro? tattha katamaa indriyesu aguttadvaarataa? idhekacco puggalo cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya nimittaggaahii hoti anubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m ^a^V0.0127^ea^ abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya na pa.tipajjati, na rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye ^a^P0.0021^ea^ na sa.mvara.m aapajjati. yaa imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m agutti agopanaa anaarakkho asa.mvaro -- aya.m vuccati indriyesu aguttadvaarataa. imaaya indriyesu aguttadvaarataaya ^a^T0.0154^ea^ samannaagato puggalo ``indriyesu aguttadvaaro''.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo bhojane amatta~n~nuu? tattha katamaa bhojane amatta~n~nutaa? idhekacco puggalo appa.tisa"nkhaa ayoniso aahaara.m ^a^M0.0124^ea^ aahaareti davaaya madaaya ma.n.danaaya vibhuusanaaya, yaa tattha asantu.t.thitaa amatta~n~nutaa appa.tisa"nkhaa bhojane -- aya.m vuccati bhojane amatta~n~nutaa. imaaya bhojane amatta~n~nutaaya samannaagato puggalo ``bhojane amatta~n~nuu''.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo mu.t.thassati? tattha katama.m mu.t.thassacca.m? yaa assati ananussati appa.tissati assati assara.nataa adhaara.nataa pilaapanataa sammusanataa -- ida.m vuccati mu.t.thassacca.m. iminaa mu.t.thassaccena samannaagato puggalo ``mu.t.thassati''.

[03] 60^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo asampajaano? tattha katama.m asampaja~n~na.m? ya.m a~n~naa.na.m adassana.m anabhisamayo ananubodho asambodho appa.tivedho asa"ngaaha.naa apariyogaaha.naa {asa.mgaahanaa apariyogaahanaa (sii0 syaa0 ka0)} asamapekkha.naa apaccavekkha.naa apaccakkhakamma.m dummejjha.m baalya.m asampaja~n~na.m moho pamoho sammoho avijjaa avijjogho avijjaayogo avijjaanusayo avijjaapariyu.t.thaana.m avijjaala"ngii moho akusalamuula.m -- ida.m vuccati asampaja~n~na.m. iminaa asampaja~n~nena samannaagato puggalo ``asampajaano''.

[03] 61^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo siilavipanno? tattha katamaa siilavipatti? kaayiko viitikkamo vaacasiko viitikkamo kaayikavaacasiko viitikkamo -- aya.m vuccati siilavipatti. sabbampi dussilya.m siilavipatti. imaaya siilavipattiyaa ^a^T0.0155^ea^ samannaagato puggalo ``siilavipanno''.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo di.t.thivipanno? tattha katamaa di.t.thivipatti? ``natthi dinna.m, natthi yi.t.tha.m, natthi huta.m, natthi sukatadukka.taana.m {suka.tadukka.taana.m (sii0)} kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, natthi aya.m loko ^a^P0.0022^ea^, natthi paro loko ^a^V0.0128^ea^, natthi maataa, natthi pitaa, natthi sattaa opapaatikaa, natthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa {samaggataa (ka0)} sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii''ti. yaa evaruupaa di.t.thi di.t.thigata.m di.t.thigahana.m di.t.thikantaaro di.t.thivisuukaayika.m di.t.thivipphandita.m di.t.thisa.myojana.m gaaho pa.tiggaaho abhiniveso paraamaaso kummaggo micchaapatho micchatta.m titthaayatana.m vipariyaasaggaaho {vipariyesaggaaho (sabbattha) padasiddhi cintetabbaa}, aya.m ^a^M0.0125^ea^ vuccati di.t.thivipatti. sabbaapi micchaadi.t.thi di.t.thivipatti. imaaya di.t.thivipattiyaa samannaagato puggalo ``di.t.thivipanno''.
[03] 63^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ajjhattasa.myojano? yassa puggalassa pa~ncorambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``ajjhattasa.myojano''.
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo bahiddhaasa.myojano? yassa puggalassa pa~ncuddhambhaagiyaani sa.myojanaani appahiinaani -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``bahiddhaasa.myojano''.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo akkodhano? tattha katamo kodho? yo kodho kujjhanaa kujjhitatta.m doso dussanaa dussitatta.m byaapatti byaapajjanaa byaapajjitatta.m virodho pa.tivirodho ca.n.dikka.m asuropo anattamanataa cittassa -- aya.m vuccati kodho. yassa puggalassa aya.m kodho pahiino ^a^T0.0156^ea^ -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``akkodhano''.

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo anupanaahii? tattha katamo upanaaho? pubbakaala.m kodho aparakaala.m upanaaho yo evaruupo upanaaho upanayhanaa upanayhitatta.m a.t.thapanaa .thapanaa sa.n.thapanaa anusa.msandanaa anuppabandhanaa da.lhiikamma.m kodhassa -- aya.m vuccati upanaaho. yassa puggalassa aya.m upanaaho pahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anupanaahii''.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo amakkhii? tattha katamo makkho? yo makkho makkhaayanaa makkhaayitatta.m ni.t.thuriya.m ni.t.thuriyakamma.m -- aya.m vuccati makkho. yassa puggalassa aya.m makkho pahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``amakkhii''.

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo apa.laasii? tattha katamo pa.laaso? yo pa.laaso pa.laasaayanaa pa.laasaayitatta.m ^a^V0.0129^ea^ pa.laasaahaaro vivaada.t.thaana.m yugaggaaho appa.tinissaggo -- aya.m vuccati pa.laaso. yassa puggalassa aya.m pa.laaso pahiino -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``apa.laasii''.

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^P0.0023^ea^ ^a^M0.0126^ea^ ca puggalo anissukii? tattha katamaa issaa? yaa paralaabhasakkaaragarukaaramaananavandanapuujanaasu issaa issaayanaa issaayitatta.m usuuyaa usuuyanaa usuuyitatta.m -- aya.m vuccati issaa. yassa puggalassa aya.m issaa pahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anissukii''.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ katamo ca pugalo amaccharii? tattha katama.m macchariya.m? pa~nca macchariyaani -- aavaasamacchariya.m, kulamacchariya.m, laabhamacchariya.m, va.n.namacchariya.m, dhammamacchariya.m. ya.m evaruupa.m macchera.m maccharaayanaa maccharaayitatta.m veviccha.m kadariya.m ka.tuka~ncukataa ^a^T0.0157^ea^ aggahitatta.m cittassa -- ida.m vuccati macchariya.m. yassa puggalassa ida.m macchariya.m pahiina.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``amaccharii''.

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo asa.tho? tattha katama.m saa.theyya.m? idhekacco sa.tho hoti parisa.tho. ya.m tattha sa.tha.m sa.thataa saa.theyya.m kakkarataa kakkariya.m parikkhattataa paarikkhattiya.m -- ida.m vuccati saa.theyya.m. yassa puggalassa ida.m saa.theyya.m pahiina.m -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``asa.tho''.

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo amaayaavii? tattha katamaa maayaa? idhekacco puggalo kaayena duccarita.m caritvaa vaacaaya duccarita.m caritvaa manasaa duccarita.m caritvaa tassa pa.ticchaadanahetu paapika.m iccha.m pa.nidahati -- ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti icchati, ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti sa"nkappati, ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti vaaca.m bhaasati, ``maa ma.m ja~n~naa''ti kaayena parakkamati. yaa evaruupaa maayaa maayaavitaa accaasaraa va~ncanaa nikati vikira.naa parihara.naa guuhanaa pariguuhanaa chaadanaa pa.ticchaadanaa anuttaaniikamma.m anaavikamma.m vocchaadanaa paapakiriyaa -- aya.m vuccati maayaa. yassa puggalassa aya.m maayaa pahiinaa -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``amaayaavii''.

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0130^ea^ ca puggalo hirimaa? tattha katamaa hirii? ya.m ^a^P0.0024^ea^ hiriiyati hiriyitabbena hiriiyati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- aya.m vuccati hirii. imaaya hiriyaa samannaagato puggalo ``hirimaa''.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ottappii? tattha katama.m ottappa.m? ya.m ottappati ottappitabbena ottappati paapakaana.m akusalaana.m dhammaana.m samaapattiyaa -- ida.m ^a^T0.0158^ea^ vuccati ottappa.m. iminaa ottappena samannaagato puggalo ``ottappii''.

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0127^ea^ ca puggalo suvaco? tattha katamaa sovacassataa? sahadhammike vuccamaane sovacassaaya.m sovacassiya.m sovacassataa avippa.tikulaggaahitaa avipaccaniikasaatataa saadariya.m saadariyataa sagaaravataa sappatissavataa -- aya.m vuccati sovacassataa. imaaya sovacassataaya samannaagato puggalo ``suvaco''.

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo kalyaa.namitto? tattha katamaa kalyaa.namittataa? ye te puggalaa saddhaa siilavanto bahussutaa caagavanto pa~n~navanto, yaa tesa.m sevanaa nisevanaa sa.msevanaa bhajanaa sambhajanaa bhatti sambhatti sampava"nkataa -- aya.m vuccati kalyaa.namittataa. imaaya kalyaa.namittataaya samannaagato puggalo ``kalyaa.namitto''.

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo indriyesu guttadvaaro? tattha katamaa indriyesu guttadvaarataa? idhekacco puggalo cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii; yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m ^a^T0.0159^ea^ abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati. yaa imesa.m channa.m indriyaana.m gutti gopanaa aarakkho sa.mvaro ^a^P0.0025^ea^ -- aya.m ^a^V0.0131^ea^ vuccati indriyesu guttadvaarataa. imaaya indriyesu guttadvaarataaya samannaagato puggalo ``indriyesu guttadvaaro''.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo bhojane matta~n~nuu? tattha katamaa bhojane matta~n~nutaa? idhekacco puggalo pa.tisa"nkhaa yoniso aahaara.m aahaareti -- ``neva davaaya, na madaaya, na ma.n.danaaya, na vibhuusanaaya; yaavadeva imassa kaayassa .thitiyaa yaapanaaya vihi.msuuparatiyaa brahmacariyaanuggahaaya. iti puraa.na~nca vedana.m pa.tiha"nkhaami, nava~nca vedana.m na uppaadessaami, yaatraa ca me bhavissati anavajjataa ca phaasuvihaaro caa''ti. yaa tattha santu.t.thitaa matta~n~nutaa ^a^M0.0128^ea^ pa.tisa"nkhaa bhojane -- aya.m vuccati bhojane matta~n~nutaa. imaaya bhojane matta~n~nutaaya samannaagato puggalo ``bhojane matta~n~nuu''.

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo upa.t.thitassati? tattha katamaa sati? yaa sati anussati pa.tissati sati sara.nataa dhaara.nataa apilaapanataa asammusanataa sati satindriya.m satibala.m sammaasati -- aya.m vuccati sati. imaaya satiyaa samannaagato puggalo ``upa.t.thitassati''.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sampajaano? tattha katama.m sampaja~n~na.m? yaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkha.naa upalakkha.naa paccupalakkha.naa pa.n.dicca.m kosalla.m nepu~n~na.m vebhabyaa cintaa upaparikkhaa bhuurii medhaa pari.naayikaa vipassanaa sampaja~n~na.m ^a^T0.0160^ea^ patodo pa~n~naa pa~n~nindriya.m pa~n~naabala.m pa~n~naasattha.m pa~n~naapaasaado pa~n~naaaaloko pa~n~naaobhaaso pa~n~naapajjoto pa~n~naaratana.m amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- ida.m vuccati sampaja~n~na.m. iminaa sampaja~n~nena samannaagato puggalo ``sampajaano''.

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo siilasampanno? tattha katamaa siilasampadaa? kaayiko aviitikkamo vaacasiko aviitikkamo kaayikavaacasiko aviitikkamo -- aya.m vuccati siilasampadaa. sabbopi siilasa.mvaro siilasampadaa. imaaya siilasampadaaya samannaagato puggalo ``siilasampanno''.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo di.t.thisampanno? tattha ^a^P0.0026^ea^ katamaa di.t.thisampadaa? ``atthi dinna.m, atthi ^a^V0.0132^ea^ yi.t.tha.m, atthi huta.m, atthi sukatadukka.taana.m kammaana.m phala.m vipaako, atthi aya.m loko, atthi paro loko, atthi maataa, atthi pitaa, atthi sattaa opapaatikaa, atthi loke sama.nabraahma.naa sammaggataa sammaapa.tipannaa ye ima~nca loka.m para~nca loka.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedentii''ti. yaa evaruupaa pa~n~naa pajaananaa...pe0... amoho dhammavicayo sammaadi.t.thi -- aya.m vuccati di.t.thisampadaa. sabbaapi sammaadi.t.thi di.t.thisampadaa. imaaya di.t.thisampadaaya samannaagato puggalo ``di.t.thisampanno''.
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ katame dve puggalaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m? yo ca pubbakaarii, yo ca kata~n~nuu katavedii -- ime dve puggalaa dullabhaa lokasmi.m.
[03] 84^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^M0.0129^ea^ dve puggalaa duttappayaa? yo ca laddha.m laddha.m nikkhipati, yo ca laddha.m laddha.m vissajjeti -- ime dve puggalaa ``duttappayaa''.
[03] 85^b^.^eb^ katame ^a^T0.0161^ea^ dve puggalaa sutappayaa? yo ca laddha.m laddha.m na nikkhipati, yo ca laddha.m laddha.m na vissajjeti -- ime dve puggalaa ``sutappayaa''.

[03] 86^b^.^eb^ katamesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m aasavaa va.d.dhanti? yo ca na kukkuccaayitabba.m kukkuccaayati, yo ca kukkuccaayitabba.m na kukkuccaayati -- imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m aasavaa va.d.dhanti.

[03] 87^b^.^eb^ katamesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m aasavaa na va.d.dhanti? yo ca na kukkuccaayitabba.m na kukkuccaayati, yo ca kukkuccaayitabba.m kukkuccaayati -- imesa.m dvinna.m puggalaana.m aasavaa na va.d.dhanti.

[03] 88^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo hiinaadhimutto? idhekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo, so a~n~na.m dussiila.m paapadhamma.m sevati bhajati payirupaasati -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``hiinaadhimutto''.

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0133^ea^ ca puggalo pa.niitaadhimutto? idhekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo, so a~n~na.m siilavanta.m kalyaa.nadhamma.m sevati bhajati payirupaasati -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``pa.niitaadhimutto''.

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^P0.0027^ea^ ca puggalo titto? paccekasambuddhaa {paccekabuddho (sii0)} ye ca tathaagatassa saavakaa arahanto tittaa. sammaasambuddho titto ca tappetaa ca {tappetaa ca, aya.m vuccati puggalo titto (sii0)}.
[06] dukaniddeso.

[03] 91^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^T0.0162^ea^ ca puggalo niraaso? idhekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no ^a^M0.0130^ea^ sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato. so su.naati -- ``itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- ``kudaassu naamaahampi aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii''ti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``niraaso''.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo aasa.mso? idhekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo. so su.naati -- ``itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. tassa eva.m hoti -- ``kudaassu naamaahampi aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii''ti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``aasa.mso''.

[03] 93^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo vigataaso? idhekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^V0.0134^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. so su.naati -- ``itthannaamo kira bhikkhu aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m ^a^T0.0163^ea^ pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharatii''ti. tassa na eva.m hoti -- ``kudaassu naamaahampi aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharissaamii''ti. ta.m kissa hetu? yaa hissa pubbe avimuttassa vimuttaasaa, saa pa.tippassaddhaa. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``vigataaso''.

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ tattha katame tayo gilaanuupamaa puggalaa? tayo gilaanaa -- idhekacco gilaano labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani ^a^P0.0028^ea^ alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhojanaani, labhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani alabhanto vaa sappaayaani bhesajjaani, labhanto vaa patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m alabhanto vaa patiruupa.m upa.t.thaaka.m, neva vu.t.thaati tamhaa aabaadhaa. [03] 95^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^T0.0165^ea^ ca puggalo kaayasakkhii? idhekacco puggalo a.t.tha vimokkhe kaayena phusitvaa viharati, pa~n~naaya cassa disvaa ekacce aasavaa parikkhii.naa honti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``kaayasakkhii''.

[03] 98^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo guuthabhaa.nii? idhekacco puggalo musaavaadii hoti sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- ``ehambho {ehi bho (syaa0 ka0) ma0 ni0 1.440; a0 ni0 3.28}, purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii''ti, so ajaana.m vaa aaha -- ``jaanaamii''ti, jaana.m vaa aaha -- ``na jaanaamii''ti, apassa.m vaa aaha -- ``passaamii''ti, passa.m vaa aaha -- ``na passaamii''ti. iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa ^a^T0.0166^ea^ sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``guuthabhaa.nii''.

[03] 99^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0133^ea^ ca puggalo pupphabhaa.nii? idhekacco puggalo musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti sabhaggato vaa parisaggato vaa ~naatimajjhagato vaa puugamajjhagato vaa raajakulamajjhagato vaa abhiniito sakkhipu.t.tho -- ``ehambho, purisa, ya.m jaanaasi ta.m vadehii''ti, so ajaana.m vaa aaha -- ``na jaanaamii''ti, jaana.m vaa aaha -- ``jaanaamii''ti, apassa.m vaa aaha -- ``na passaamii''ti, passa.m vaa aaha -- ``passaamii''ti. iti attahetu vaa parahetu vaa aamisaki~ncikkhahetu vaa na sampajaanamusaa bhaasitaa hoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``pupphabhaa.nii''.

[03] 101^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo arukuupamacitto? idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati {pati.t.thiiyati (syaa0 ka0) a0 ni0 3.25}, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi naama du.t.thaaruko ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya {kathalaaya (ka0), kathalena (a.t.thakathaa) a0 ni0 3.25} vaa gha.t.tito bhiyyoso mattaaya aasava.m deti {assavanoti (sii0)}, evameva.m idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``arukuupamacitto''.

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0135^ea^ ca puggalo avakujjapa~n~no? idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa {gato (sii0), gantvaa (syaa0)} hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassava.naaya {dhammassavanaaya (syaa0)}. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. seyyathaapi naama kumbho nikkujjo {nikujjo (syaa0) a0 ni0 3.30} tatra udaka.m aasitta.m viva.t.tati, no sa.n.thaati; evameva.m idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassava.naaya ^a^T0.0169^ea^. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. vu.t.thitopi tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``avakujjapa~n~no''.

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo uccha"ngapa~n~no? idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassava.naaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti. vu.t.thito ca kho tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadi.m manasi karoti, na majjha.m manasi karoti, na pariyosaana.m manasi karoti. seyyathaapi naama purisassa uccha"nge naanaakhajjakaani aaki.n.naani -- tilaa ^a^P0.0032^ea^ ta.n.dulaa {tilata.n.dulaa (ka0) a0 ni0 3.30} modakaa badaraa. so tamhaa aasanaa vu.t.thahanto satisammosaa pakireyya. evameva.m idhekacco puggalo aaraama.m gantaa hoti abhikkha.na.m bhikkhuuna.m santike dhammassava.naaya. tassa bhikkhuu dhamma.m desenti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m ^a^M0.0136^ea^ saattha.m sabya~njana.m kevalaparipu.n.na.m ^a^V0.0139^ea^ parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaasenti. so tasmi.m aasane nisinno tassaa kathaaya aadimpi ^a^T0.0170^ea^ manasi karoti, majjhampi manasi karoti, pariyosaanampi manasi karoti. vu.t.thito ca kho tamhaa aasanaa tassaa kathaaya neva aadimpi manasi karoti, na majjhampi manasi karoti, na pariyosaanampi manasi karoti -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``uccha"ngapa~n~no''.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ tattha katame tayo potthakuupamaa puggalaa? tayo potthakaa -- navopi potthako dubba.n.no ceva hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca, majjhimopi potthako dubba.n.no ceva hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca, ji.n.nopi potthako dubba.n.no ceva hoti dukkhasamphasso ca appaggho ca. ji.n.nampi potthaka.m ukkhaliparimajjana.m vaa karonti sa"nkaarakuu.te vaa na.m cha.d.denti. evameva.m tayome potthakuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu. katame tayo? navo cepi bhikkhu hoti dussiilo paapadhammo, idamassa dubba.n.nataaya. seyyathaapi so potthako dubba.n.no, tathuupamo ^a^M0.0138^ea^ aya.m puggalo. ye kho panassa sevanti bhajanti payirupaasanti di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjanti, tesa.m ta.m hoti diigharatta.m ahitaaya dukkhaaya. idamassa dukkhasamphassataaya. seyyathaapi so potthako dukkhasamphasso, tathuupamo aya.m puggalo. yesa.m kho pana so pa.tigga.nhaati ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m ^a^V0.0141^ea^, tesa.m ta.m na mahapphala.m hoti na mahaanisa.msa.m. idamassa appagghataaya. seyyathaapi so potthako appaggho, tathuupamo aya.m puggalo.

[03] 118^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^T0.0175^ea^ ca puggalo suppameyyo? idhekacco puggalo uddhato hoti unna.lo capalo mukharo viki.n.navaaco mu.t.thassati asampajaano asamaahito vibbhantacitto paaka.tindriyo -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``suppameyyo''.

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo duppameyyo? idhekacco puggalo anuddhato hoti anunna.lo acapalo amukharo aviki.n.navaaco upa.t.thitassati ^a^M0.0140^ea^ sampajaano samaahito ekaggacitto sa.mvutindriyo -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``duppameyyo''.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo appameyyo? idhekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati -- aya.m vuccati puggalo ``appameyyo''.

[03] 121^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^V0.0143^ea^ ca puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo hiino hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo puggalo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo, a~n~natra anuddayaa a~n~natra anukampaa.

[03] 122^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo sadiso hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ``siilasaama~n~nagataana.m sata.m siilakathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii bhavissati; samaadhisaama~n~nagataana.m sata.m samaadhikathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii {pavattanii (sii0) a0 ni0 3.26} bhavissati; pa~n~naasaama~n~nagataana.m ^a^T0.0176^ea^ sata.m pa~n~naakathaa ca no bhavissati, saa ca no phaasu bhavissati, saa ca no pavattinii bhavissatii''ti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo.

[03] 123^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo adhiko hoti siilena samaadhinaa pa~n~naaya. evaruupo puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ``aparipuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa siilakkhandha.m tattha ^a^P0.0036^ea^ tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaami; aparipuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa samaadhikkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaami; aparipuura.m vaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m paripuuressaami, paripuura.m vaa pa~n~naakkhandha.m tattha tattha pa~n~naaya anuggahessaamii''ti. tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sakkatvaa garu.m katvaa sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0141^ea^ ca puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo dussiilo hoti paapadhammo asuci sa"nkassarasamaacaaro pa.ticchannakammanto assama.no sama.napa.ti~n~no abrahmacaarii brahmacaaripa.ti~n~no antopuuti avassuto kasambujaato. evaruupo puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ki~ncaapi evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati ^a^T0.0177^ea^ -- ``paapamitto purisapuggalo paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko''ti. seyyathaapi naama ahi guuthagato ki~ncaapi na .da.msati, atha kho ^a^V0.0144^ea^ na.m makkheti; evameva.m ki~ncaapi evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m paapako kittisaddo abbhuggacchati -- ``paapamitto purisapuggalo paapasahaayo paapasampava"nko''ti! tasmaa evaruupo puggalo jigucchitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo.

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi naama du.t.thaaruko ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tito bhiyyoso mattaaya aasava.m deti, evameva.m idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi naama tindukaalaata.m ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tita.m bhiyyoso mattaaya cicci.taayati ci.tici.taayati, evameva.m idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca paatukaroti. seyyathaapi naama guuthakuupo ka.t.thena vaa ka.thalaaya vaa gha.t.tito bhiyyoso mattaaya duggandho hoti, evameva.m idhekacco puggalo kodhano hoti upaayaasabahulo, appampi ^a^T0.0178^ea^ vutto samaano abhisajjati kuppati byaapajjati patitthiiyati, kopa~nca dosa~nca appaccaya~nca ^a^P0.0037^ea^ paatukaroti; evaruupo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ``akkoseyyapi ma.m paribhaaseyyapi ma.m anatthampi ^a^M0.0142^ea^ me kareyyaa''ti! tasmaa evaruupo puggalo ajjhupekkhitabbo na sevitabbo na bhajitabbo na payirupaasitabbo.

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo? idhekacco puggalo siilavaa hoti kalyaa.nadhammo -- evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo. ta.m kissa hetu? ki~ncaapi evaruupassa puggalassa na di.t.thaanugati.m aapajjati, atha kho na.m kalyaa.no kittisaddo abbhuggacchati -- ``kalyaa.namitto purisapuggalo kalyaa.nasahaayo kalyaa.nasampava"nko''ti! tasmaa evaruupo puggalo sevitabbo bhajitabbo payirupaasitabbo.

[03] katamo ^a^M0.0162^ea^ ca puggalo ghosappamaa.no ghosappasanno? idhekacco puggalo parava.n.nanaaya parathomanaaya ^a^V0.0164^ea^ parapasa.msanaaya parava.n.nahaarikaaya {parava.n.nahaariyaa (sii0)} tattha pamaa.na.m gahetvaa pasaada.m janeti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ghosappamaa.no ghosappasanno.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo luukhappamaa.no luukhappasanno? idhekacco puggalo ciivaraluukha.m vaa passitvaa pattaluukha.m vaa passitvaa senaasanaluukha.m vaa passitvaa vividha.m vaa dukkarakaarika.m passitvaa tattha pamaa.na.m gahetvaa pasaada.m janeti. aya.m vuccati puggalo luukhappamaa.no luukhappasanno.

[03] katamo ca puggalo dhammappamaa.no dhammappasanno? idhekacco puggalo siila.m vaa passitvaa samaadhi.m vaa passitvaa pa~n~na.m ^a^P0.0054^ea^ vaa passitvaa tattha pamaa.na.m gahetvaa pasaada.m janeti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ^a^T0.0205^ea^ dhammappamaa.no dhammappasanno.

[03] 173^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya? idhekacco puggalo attanaa siilasampanno hoti, no para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa samaadhisampanno hoti, no para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimuttisampanno hoti, no para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. eva.m puggalo attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya.

[03] katha~nca puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no attahitaaya? idhekacco puggalo attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimuttisampanno hoti, para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. eva.m puggalo parahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no attahitaaya.

[03] katha~nca ^a^M0.0163^ea^ puggalo attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya ca? idhekacco puggalo attanaa ca siilasampanno hoti, para~nca siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca samaadhisampanno hoti, para~nca samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca pa~n~naasampanno hoti, para~nca pa~n~naasampadaaya ^a^T0.0206^ea^ ^a^V0.0165^ea^ samaadapeti; attanaa ca vimuttisampanno hoti, para~nca vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa ca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, para~nca vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. eva.m puggalo attahitaaya ceva pa.tipanno hoti parahitaaya ca.

[03] katha~nca puggalo neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya? idhekacco puggalo attanaa na siilasampanno hoti, no para.m siilasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na samaadhisampanno hoti, no para.m samaadhisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na pa~n~naasampanno hoti, no para.m pa~n~naasampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na ^a^P0.0055^ea^ vimuttisampanno hoti, no para.m vimuttisampadaaya samaadapeti; attanaa na vimutti~naa.nadassanasampanno hoti, no para.m vimutti~naa.nadassanasampadaaya samaadapeti. eva.m puggalo neva attahitaaya pa.tipanno hoti no parahitaaya.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idhekacco puggalo acelako hoti muttaacaaro hatthaapalekhano {hatthaavalekhano (syaa0)}, naehibhaddantiko nati.t.thabhaddantiko naabhiha.ta.m na uddissakata.m na nimantana.m saadiyati, so na kumbhimukhaa pa.tigga.nhaati na ka.lopimukhaa {kalopimukhaa (sii0 syaa0) ma0 ni0 2.7} pa.tigga.nhaati, na e.lakamantara.m na da.n.damantara.m na musalamantara.m na dvinna.m bhu~njamaanaana.m na gabbhiniyaa na paayamaanaaya na purisantaragataaya, na sa"nkittiisu na yattha saa upa.t.thito hoti na yattha makkhikaa sa.n.dasa.n.dacaarinii, na maccha.m na ^a^T0.0207^ea^ ma.msa.m na sura.m na meraya.m na thusodaka.m pivati. so ekaagaariko vaa hoti ekaalopiko, dvaagaariko vaa hoti dvaalopiko...pe0... sattaagaariko vaa hoti sattaalopiko; ekissaapi dattiyaa yaapeti, dviihipi dattiihi yaapeti...pe0... sattahipi dattiihi yaapeti; ekaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti, dviihikampi {dvaahikampi (sii0)} aahaara.m aahaareti...pe0... sattaahikampi aahaara.m aahaareti. iti evaruupa.m ^a^M0.0164^ea^ a.d.dhamaasikampi pariyaayabhattabhojanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. so saakabhakkho vaa hoti saamaakabhakkho vaa hoti niivaarabhakkho vaa hoti daddulabhakkho vaa hoti ha.tabhakkho vaa hoti ka.nabhakkho vaa hoti aacaamabhakkho vaa hoti pi~n~naakabhakkho vaa hoti ti.nabhakkho vaa hoti gomayabhakkho vaa hoti, vanamuulaphalaahaaro yaapeti pavattaphalabhojii. so saa.naanipi dhaareti masaa.naanipi dhaareti chavadussaanipi dhaareti pa.msukuulaanipi dhaareti tirii.taanipi dhaareti ajinampi dhaareti ajinakkhipampi dhaareti kusaciirampi dhaareti vaakaciirampi dhaareti phalakaciirampi dhaareti kesakambalampi dhaareti vaa.lakambalampi dhaareti uluukapakkhampi ^a^V0.0166^ea^ {ulukapakkhampi (sii0 syaa0)} dhaareti, kesamassulocakopi hoti kesamassulocanaanuyogamanuyutto, ubbha.t.thakopi hoti aasanapa.tikkhitto, ukku.tikopi hoti ukku.tikappadhaanamanuyutto, ka.n.takaapassayikopi hoti ka.n.takaapassaye seyya.m kappeti, saayatatiyakampi {saaya.mtatiyakampi (syaa0 ka0) ma0 ni0 2.7} udakorohanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati. iti evaruupa.m anekavihita.m kaayassa aataapanaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto viharati ^a^P0.0056^ea^. eva.m puggalo attantapo hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 175^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idhekacco puggalo orabbhiko hoti suukariko saaku.niko maagaviko luddo macchaghaatako coro coraghaatako goghaatako bandhanaagaariko, ye vaa pana~n~nepi keci kuruurakammantaa. eva.m puggalo parantapo hoti paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? idhekacco puggalo raajaa vaa hoti khattiyo muddhaavasitto {muddhaabhisitto (syaa0 ka0)} braahma.no vaa mahaasaalo. so puratthimena narassa nava.m sandhaagaara.m {santaagaara.m (syaa0), ya~n~naagaara.m (sii0)} kaaraapetvaa kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kharaajina.m {khuraajina.m (syaa0 ka0)} nivaasetvaa sappitelena kaaya.m abbha~njitvaa ^a^M0.0165^ea^ migavisaa.nena pi.t.thi.m ka.n.duvamaano {ka.n.duuyamaano (sii0)} sandhaagaara.m pavisati saddhi.m mahesiyaa braahma.nena ca purohitena. so tattha anantarahitaaya bhuumiyaa haritupalittaaya seyya.m kappeti. ekissaa gaaviyaa saruupavacchaaya ya.m ekasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena raajaa yaapeti, ya.m dutiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena mahesii yaapeti, ya.m tatiyasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena braahma.no purohito yaapeti, ya.m catutthasmi.m thane khiira.m hoti tena aggi.m juhati, avasesena vacchako yaapeti. so evamaaha -- ``ettakaa usabhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchataraa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa vacchatariyo ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa ^a^T0.0209^ea^ ajaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, ettakaa urabbhaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya, (ettakaa assaa ha~n~nantu ya~n~natthaaya) {( ) natthi siiha.lapotthake. majjhimanikaaye kandarakasuttepi evameva} ettakaa rukkhaa chijjantu yuupatthaaya, ettakaa dabbhaa luuyantu barihisatthaayaa''ti {parihi.msatthaayaati (sii0 syaa0 ka0) ma0 ni0 2.9}. yepissa te honti daasaati vaa pessaati vaa kammakaraati vaa, tepi da.n.datajjitaa bhayatajjitaa assumukhaa rudamaanaa parikammaani karonti. eva.m puggalo attantapo ca hoti attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, parantapo ca paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto.

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo neva attantapo ca hoti na attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo ^a^V0.0167^ea^ na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto? so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati.

[03] idha tathaagato loke uppajjati araha.m sammaasambuddho vijjaacara.nasampanno ^a^P0.0057^ea^ sugato lokaviduu anuttaro purisadammasaarathi satthaa devamanussaana.m buddho bhagavaa. so ima.m loka.m sadevaka.m samaaraka.m sabrahmaka.m sassama.nabraahma.ni.m paja.m sadevamanussa.m saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa pavedeti. so dhamma.m deseti aadikalyaa.na.m majjhekalyaa.na.m pariyosaanakalyaa.na.m saattha.m sabya~njana.m, kevalaparipu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m pakaaseti. ta.m dhamma.m su.naati gahapati vaa gahapatiputto vaa a~n~natarasmi.m vaa kule paccaajaato ^a^M0.0166^ea^. so ta.m dhamma.m sutvaa tathaagate saddha.m pa.tilabhati. so tena saddhaapa.tilaabhena ^a^T0.0210^ea^ samannaagato iti pa.tisa~ncikkhati -- ``sambaadho gharaavaaso rajaapatho, abbhokaaso pabbajjaa. nayida.m sukara.m agaara.m ajjhaavasataa ekantaparipu.n.na.m ekantaparisuddha.m sa"nkhalikhita.m brahmacariya.m caritu.m. ya.mnuunaaha.m kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajeyya''nti! so aparena samayena appa.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa bhogakkhandha.m pahaaya appa.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya mahanta.m vaa ~naatipariva.t.ta.m pahaaya kesamassu.m ohaaretvaa kaasaayaani vatthaani acchaadetvaa agaarasmaa anagaariya.m pabbajati.

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ so eva.m pabbajito samaano bhikkhuuna.m sikkhaasaajiivasamaapanno paa.naatipaata.m pahaaya paa.naatipaataa pa.tivirato hoti nihitada.n.do nihitasattho lajjii dayaapanno sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii viharati.
[03] adinnaadaana.m pahaaya adinnaadaanaa pa.tivirato hoti dinnaadaayii dinnapaa.tika"nkhii, athenena sucibhuutena attanaa viharati.
[03] abrahmacariya.m pahaaya brahmacaarii hoti aaraacaarii {anaacaarii (ka0)} pa.tivirato methunaa gaamadhammaa.
[03] musaavaada.m pahaaya musaavaadaa pa.tivirato hoti saccavaadii saccasandho theto paccayiko avisa.mvaadako lokassa.

[03] pisu.na.m ^a^V0.0168^ea^ vaaca.m pahaaya pisu.naaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti, ito sutvaa na amutra akkhaataa imesa.m bhedaaya, amutra vaa sutvaa na imesa.m akkhaataa amuusa.m bhedaaya. iti bhinnaana.m vaa sandhaataa sahitaana.m vaa anuppadaataa samaggaaraamo samaggarato samagganandii ^a^T0.0211^ea^ samaggakara.ni.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] pharusa.m vaaca.m pahaaya pharusaaya vaacaaya pa.tivirato hoti. yaa saa vaacaa nelaa ka.n.nasukhaa pemaniiyaa hadaya"ngamaa porii bahujanakantaa bahujanamanaapaa tathaaruupi.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa hoti.

[03] samphappalaapa.m ^a^P0.0058^ea^ ^a^M0.0167^ea^ pahaaya samphappalaapaa pa.tivirato hoti, kaalavaadii bhuutavaadii atthavaadii dhammavaadii vinayavaadii nidhaanavati.m vaaca.m bhaasitaa kaalena saapadesa.m pariyantavati.m atthasa.mhita.m.

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ so biijagaamabhuutagaamasamaarambhaa pa.tivirato hoti, ekabhattiko hoti rattuuparato virato vikaalabhojanaa, naccagiitavaaditavisuukadassanaa pa.tivirato hoti, maalaagandhavilepanadhaara.nama.n.danavibhuusana.t.thaanaa pa.tivirato hoti, uccaasayanamahaasayanaa pa.tivirato hoti, jaataruuparajatapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti.

[03] aamakadha~n~napa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aamakama.msapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, itthikumaarikaapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, daasidaasapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, aje.lakapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, kukku.tasuukarapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, hatthigavaassava.lavapa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, khettavatthupa.tiggaha.naa pa.tivirato hoti, duuteyyapahi.nagamanaanuyogaa pa.tivirato hoti, kayavikkayaa pa.tivirato hoti, tulaakuu.taka.msakuu.tamaanakuu.taa pa.tivirato hoti, ukko.tanava~ncananikatisaaciyogaa {... saaviyogaa (syaa0 ka0)} pa.tivirato hoti, chedanavadhabandhanaviparaamosaaalopasahasaakaaraa pa.tivirato hoti.

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ so santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva ^a^T0.0212^ea^ pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati, seyyathaapi naama pakkhii saku.no yena yeneva .deti sapattabhaarova .deti. evameva.m bhikkhu santu.t.tho hoti kaayaparihaarikena ciivarena kucchiparihaarikena ^a^V0.0169^ea^ pi.n.dapaatena. so yena yeneva pakkamati samaadaayeva pakkamati. so iminaa ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato ajjhatta.m anavajjasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ so cakkhunaa ruupa.m disvaa na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m cakkhundriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati cakkhundriya.m, cakkhundriye sa.mvara.m aapajjati; sotena sadda.m sutvaa...pe0... ghaanena ^a^M0.0168^ea^ gandha.m ghaayitvaa...pe0... jivhaaya rasa.m saayitvaa...pe0... kaayena pho.t.thabba.m phusitvaa...pe0... manasaa dhamma.m vi~n~naaya na nimittaggaahii hoti naanubya~njanaggaahii. yatvaadhikara.namena.m manindriya.m asa.mvuta.m viharanta.m abhijjhaadomanassaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa anvaassaveyyu.m, tassa sa.mvaraaya pa.tipajjati, rakkhati manindriya.m, manindriye ^a^P0.0059^ea^ sa.mvara.m aapajjati. so iminaa ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato ajjhatta.m abyaasekasukha.m pa.tisa.mvedeti.

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ so abhikkante pa.tikkante sampajaanakaarii hoti, aalokite vilokite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sami~njite pasaarite sampajaanakaarii hoti, sa"nghaa.tipattaciivaradhaara.ne sampajaanakaarii hoti, asite piite khaayite saayite sampajaanakaarii hoti, uccaarapassaavakamme sampajaanakaarii hoti, gate .thite nisinne sutte ^a^T0.0213^ea^ jaagarite bhaasite tu.nhiibhaave sampajaanakaarii hoti.

[03] so iminaa ca ariyena siilakkhandhena samannaagato iminaa ca ariyena indriyasa.mvarena samannaagato iminaa ca ariyena satisampaja~n~nena samannaagato imaaya ca ariyaaya santu.t.thiyaa samannaagato {passa ma0 ni0 2 kandarakasutte; a0 ni0 1 attantapasutte ca} vivitta.m senaasana.m bhajati ara~n~na.m rukkhamuula.m pabbata.m kandara.m giriguha.m susaana.m vanapattha.m abbhokaasa.m palaalapu~nja.m. so pacchaabhatta.m pi.n.dapaatapa.tikkanto nisiidati palla"nka.m aabhujitvaa uju.m kaaya.m pa.nidhaaya parimukha.m sati.m upa.t.thapetvaa. so abhijjha.m loke pahaaya vigataabhijjhena cetasaa viharati, abhijjhaaya citta.m parisodheti; byaapaadapadosa.m pahaaya abyaapannacitto viharati sabbapaa.nabhuutahitaanukampii, byaapaadapadosaa citta.m parisodheti; thinamiddha.m {thiinamiddha.m (sii0 syaa0)} pahaaya vigatathinamiddho viharati aalokasa~n~nii sato sampajaano, thinamiddhaa citta.m parisodheti; uddhaccakukkucca.m pahaaya anuddhato viharati ajjhatta.m vuupasantacitto, uddhaccakukkuccaa ^a^V0.0170^ea^ citta.m parisodheti; vicikiccha.m pahaaya ti.n.navicikiccho viharati akatha.mkathii kusalesu dhammesu, vicikicchaaya citta.m parisodheti.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ so ime pa~nca niivara.ne pahaaya cetaso upakkilese pa~n~naaya dubbaliikara.ne vivicceva kaamehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakka.m ^a^M0.0169^ea^ savicaara.m vivekaja.m piitisukha.m pa.thama.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; vitakkavicaaraana.m vuupasamaa ajjhatta.m sampasaadana.m cetaso ekodibhaava.m avitakka.m avicaara.m samaadhija.m piitisukha.m dutiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; piitiyaa ca ^a^T0.0214^ea^ viraagaa upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajaano sukha~nca kaayena pa.tisa.mvedeti, ya.m ta.m ariyaa aacikkhanti -- ``upekkhako satimaa sukhavihaarii''ti tatiya.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati; sukhassa ca pahaanaa dukkhassa ca pahaanaa pubbeva somanassadomanassaana.m attha"ngamaa adukkhamasukha.m upekkhaasatipaarisuddhi.m catuttha.m jhaana.m upasampajja viharati.

[03] so ^a^P0.0060^ea^ eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati, seyyathida.m -- ekampi jaati.m dvepi jaatiyo tissopi jaatiyo catassopi jaatiyo pa~ncapi jaatiyo dasapi jaatiyo viisampi jaatiyo ti.msampi jaatiyo cattaaliisampi jaatiyo pa~n~naasampi jaatiyo jaatisatampi jaatisahassampi jaatisatasahassampi anekepi sa.mva.t.takappe anekepi viva.t.takappe anekepi sa.mva.t.taviva.t.takappe -- ``amutraasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto amutra udapaadi.m; tatraapaasi.m eva.mnaamo eva.mgotto eva.mva.n.no evamaahaaro eva.msukhadukkhapa.tisa.mvedii evamaayupariyanto, so tato cuto idhuupapanno''ti. iti saakaara.m sauddesa.m anekavihita.m pubbenivaasa.m anussarati.

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte sattaana.m cutuupapaata~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so dibbena ^a^T0.0215^ea^ cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati -- ``ime vata bhonto sattaa ^a^V0.0171^ea^ kaayaduccaritena samannaagataa, vaciiduccaritena samannaagataa, manoduccaritena samannaagataa, ariyaana.m upavaadakaa, micchaadi.t.thikaa micchaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa apaaya.m duggati.m vinipaata.m niraya.m upapannaa. ime vaa pana bhonto sattaa kaayasucaritena ^a^M0.0170^ea^ samannaagataa vaciisucaritena samannaagataa manosucaritena samannaagataa ariyaana.m anupavaadakaa sammaadi.t.thikaa sammaadi.t.thikammasamaadaanaa. te kaayassa bhedaa para.m mara.naa sugati.m sagga.m loka.m upapannaa''ti. so iti dibbena cakkhunaa visuddhena atikkantamaanusakena satte passati cavamaane upapajjamaane hiine pa.niite suva.n.ne dubba.n.ne, sugate duggate yathaakammuupage satte pajaanaati.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ so eva.m samaahite citte parisuddhe pariyodaate ana"nga.ne vigatuupakkilese mudubhuute kammaniye .thite aane~njappatte aasavaana.m khaya~naa.naaya citta.m abhininnaameti. so ``ida.m dukkha''nti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhasamudayo''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodho''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m dukkhanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``ime ^a^P0.0061^ea^ aasavaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m aasavasamudayo''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m aasavanirodho''ti yathaabhuuta.m pajaanaati, ``aya.m aasavanirodhagaaminii pa.tipadaa''ti yathaabhuuta.m ^a^T0.0216^ea^ pajaanaati. tassa eva.m jaanato eva.m passato kaamaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, bhavaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati, avijjaasavaapi citta.m vimuccati. vimuttasmi.m vimuttamiti ~naa.na.m hoti. ``khii.naa jaati, vusita.m brahmacariya.m, kata.m kara.niiya.m, naapara.m itthattaayaa''ti pajaanaati. eva.m puggalo neva attantapo ca hoti na attaparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto, na parantapo na paraparitaapanaanuyogamanuyutto. so anattantapo aparantapo di.t.theva dhamme nicchaato nibbuto siitiibhuuto sukhappa.tisa.mvedii brahmabhuutena attanaa viharati.
[03] 186^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo saraago? yassa puggalassa raago appahiino, aya.m vuccati puggalo ``saraago''.
[03] katamo ca puggalo sadoso? yassa puggalassa doso appahiino, aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sadoso''.
[03] katamo ^a^V0.0172^ea^ ca puggalo samoho? yassa puggalassa moho appahiino, aya.m vuccati puggalo ``samoho''.
[03] katamo ca puggalo samaano? yassa puggalassa maano appahiino, aya.m vuccati puggalo ``samaano''.

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ katha~nca ^a^M0.0171^ea^ puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m, na laabhii lokuttaramaggassa vaa phalassa vaa. eva.m puggalo laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] katha~nca puggalo laabhii hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa? idhekacco puggalo ^a^T0.0217^ea^ laabhii hoti lokuttaramaggassa vaa phalassa vaa, na laabhii ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m. eva.m puggalo laabhii hoti adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya, na laabhii ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa.

[03] katha~nca puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya? idhekacco puggalo laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m, laabhii lokuttaramaggassa vaa phalassa vaa. eva.m puggalo laabhii ceva hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, laabhii ca adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.

[03] katha~nca ^a^P0.0062^ea^ puggalo neva laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya? idhekacco puggalo neva laabhii hoti ruupasahagataana.m vaa aruupasahagataana.m vaa samaapattiina.m, na laabhii lokuttaramaggassa vaa phalassa vaa. eva.m puggalo neva laabhii hoti ajjhatta.m cetosamathassa, na laabhii adhipa~n~naadhammavipassanaaya.
[03] 188^b^.^eb^ katamo ca puggalo anusotagaamii? idhekacco puggalo kaame ca pa.tisevati paapa~nca kamma.m karoti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``anusotagaamii''.

[03] katamo ^a^V0.0173^ea^ ca puggalo pa.tisotagaamii? idhekacco puggalo kaame ca na pa.tisevati paapa~nca kamma.m na karoti. so sahaapi dukkhena sahaapi domanassena assumukhenapi rudamaano paripu.n.na.m parisuddha.m brahmacariya.m carati. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``pa.tisotagaamii''.

[03] katamo ^a^M0.0172^ea^ ca puggalo .thitatto? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m ^a^T0.0218^ea^ parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``.thitatto''.

[03] katamo ca puggalo ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no? idhekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati puggalo ti.n.no paara"ngato thale ti.t.thati braahma.no.

[03] 189^b^.^eb^ katha~nca puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno? idhekaccassa puggalassa appaka.m suta.m hoti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa appakassa sutassa na atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno {na dhammama~n~naaya na dhammaanudhammapa.tipanno (syaa0), na dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno (ka0)} ^a^P0.0063^ea^ hoti. eva.m puggalo appassuto hoti sutena anupapanno.

[03] katha~nca puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno? idhekaccassa puggalassa appaka.m suta.m hoti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa appakassa sutassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m puggalo appassuto hoti sutena upapanno.

[03] katha~nca puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena anupapanno? idhekaccassa puggalassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa bahukassa sutassa na atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m puggalo bahussuto ^a^T0.0219^ea^ hoti sutena anupapanno.

[03] katha~nca puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno? idhekaccassa puggalassa bahuka.m suta.m hoti ^a^V0.0174^ea^ sutta.m geyya.m veyyaakara.na.m gaatha.m udaana.m itivuttaka.m jaataka.m abbhutadhamma.m vedalla.m. so tassa bahukassa sutassa atthama~n~naaya dhammama~n~naaya dhammaanudhammappa.tipanno hoti. eva.m puggalo bahussuto hoti sutena upapanno.

[03] 190^b^.^eb^ katamo ^a^M0.0173^ea^ ca puggalo sama.namacalo? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa sotaapanno hoti avinipaatadhammo niyato sambodhiparaayano. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sama.namacalo''.

[03] katamo ca puggalo sama.napadumo? idhekacco puggalo ti.n.na.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa raagadosamohaana.m tanuttaa sakadaagaamii hoti, sakideva ima.m loka.m aagantvaa dukkhassanta.m karoti. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sama.napadumo''.

[03] katamo ca puggalo sama.napu.n.dariiko? idhekacco puggalo pa~ncanna.m orambhaagiyaana.m sa.myojanaana.m parikkhayaa opapaatiko hoti tattha parinibbaayii anaavattidhammo tasmaa lokaa. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sama.napu.n.dariiko''.

[03] katamo ca puggalo sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo? idhekacco puggalo aasavaana.m khayaa anaasava.m cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m di.t.theva dhamme saya.m abhi~n~naa sacchikatvaa upasampajja viharati. aya.m vuccati puggalo ``sama.nesu sama.nasukhumaalo''ti.
[06] catukkaniddeso.

[03] 191^b^.^eb^ tatra ^a^T0.0220^ea^ ^a^P0.0064^ea^ yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati ca vippa.tisaarii ca hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti ^a^V0.0175^ea^, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aayasmato kho aarambhajaa {aarabbhajaa (ka0) a0 ni0 5.142} aasavaa sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa pava.d.dhanti. saadhu vataayasmaa aarambhaje aasave pahaaya vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu. evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''ti.

[03] tatra yvaaya.m puggalo aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa ^a^M0.0174^ea^ akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa nappava.d.dhanti. saadhu vataayasmaa aarambhaje aasave pahaaya citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu. evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''ti.

[03] tatra yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te uppannaa paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa na sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa ^a^T0.0221^ea^ aasavaa pava.d.dhanti. saadhu vataayasmaa vippa.tisaaraje aasave pa.tivinodetvaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu. evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''ti.

[03] tatra yvaaya.m puggalo na aarabhati na vippa.tisaarii hoti, ta~nca cetovimutti.m pa~n~naavimutti.m yathaabhuuta.m nappajaanaati, yatthassa te paapakaa akusalaa dhammaa aparisesaa nirujjhanti, so evamassa vacaniiyo -- ``aayasmato kho aarambhajaa aasavaa na sa.mvijjanti, vippa.tisaarajaa aasavaa nappava.d.dhanti. saadhu vataayasmaa citta.m pa~n~na~nca bhaavetu. evamaayasmaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena samasamo bhavissatii''ti. ime cattaaro puggalaa amunaa pa~ncamena puggalena eva.m ovadiyamaanaa eva.m anusaasiyamaanaa anupubbena aasavaana.m khaya.m paapu.nanti.

[03] 192^b^.^eb^ katha~nca ^a^P0.0065^ea^ puggalo datvaa avajaanaati? idhekacco puggalo yassa puggalassa deti ciivarapi.n.dapaatasenaasanagilaanapaccayabhesajjaparikkhaara.m, tassa eva.m hoti -- ``aha.m dammi, aya.m {aya.m pana (syaa0 ka0) a0 ni0 5.141} pa.tigga.nhaatii''ti, tamena.m datvaa avajaanaati. eva.m puggalo datvaa avajaanaati.

[03] katha~nca puggalo sa.mvaasena avajaanaati? idhekacco puggalo yena puggalena saddhi.m sa.mvasati dve vaa tii.ni vaa vassaani, tamena.m sa.mvaasena avajaanaati. eva.m puggalo sa.mvaasena avajaanaati.

[03] katha~nca ^a^M0.0175^ea^ puggalo aadheyyamukho hoti? idhekacco puggalo parassa va.n.ne vaa ava.n.ne vaa bhaasiyamaane khippa~n~neva adhimuccitaa hoti. eva.m puggalo aadheyyamukho hoti ^a^T0.0222^ea^.
[03] katha~nca ^a^V0.0176^ea^ puggalo lolo hoti? idhekacco puggalo ittarasaddho hoti ittarabhattii ittarapemo ittarappasaado. eva.m puggalo lolo hoti.

[03] katha~nca puggalo mando momuuho hoti? idhekacco puggalo kusalaakusale dhamme na jaanaati, saavajjaanavajje dhamme na jaanaati, hiinappa.niite dhamme na jaanaati, ka.nhasukkasappa.tibhaage dhamme na jaanaati. eva.m puggalo mando momuuho hoti.

[03] 193^b^.^eb^ tattha katame pa~nca yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa? pa~nca yodhaajiivaa -- idhekacco yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati {satthambhati (sii0) a0 ni0 5.141} na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m pa.thamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] puna capara.m idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m, api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m dutiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] puna capara.m idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m sahati dhajagga.m, api ca kho ussaara.na~n~neva {ussaadana.myeva (sii0), ussaadana~n~neva (syaa0 ka0) a0 ni0 5.141} sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m. evaruupopi idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m tatiyo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] puna capara.m idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m sahati ^a^P0.0066^ea^ dhajagga.m sahati ussaara.na.m, api ^a^V0.0177^ea^ ca kho sampahaare ha~n~nati byaapajjati. evaruupopi idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m catuttho yodhaajiivo ^a^T0.0223^ea^ santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m.

[03] puna ^a^M0.0176^ea^ capara.m idhekacco yodhaajiivo sahati rajagga.m sahati dhajagga.m sahati ussaara.na.m sahati sampahaara.m. so ta.m sa"ngaama.m abhivijinitvaa vijitasa"ngaamo tameva sa"ngaamasiisa.m ajjhaavasati. evaruupopi idhekacco yodhaajiivo hoti. aya.m pa~ncamo yodhaajiivo santo sa.mvijjamaano lokasmi.m. ime pa~nca yodhaajiivaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa lokasmi.m.

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ evameva.m pa~ncime yodhaajiivuupamaa puggalaa santo sa.mvijjamaanaa bhikkhuusu. katame pa~nca? idhekacco bhikkhu rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m {santaanetu.m (sii0 syaa0) a0 ni0 5.75}, sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa {aaviikatvaa (sii0)} sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa rajaggasmi.m? idha bhikkhu su.naati -- ``asukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa''ti. so ta.m sutvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa rajaggasmi.m.

[03] seyyathaapi so yodhaajiivo rajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti sa"ngaama.m otaritu.m, tathuupamo aya.m puggalo. evaruupopi idhekacco puggalo hoti. aya.m pa.thamo yodhaajiivuupamo puggalo santo sa.mvijjamaano bhikkhuusu.

[03] 195^b^.^eb^ puna capara.m idhekacco bhikkhu sahati rajagga.m, api ca kho dhajagga~n~neva disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati ^a^T0.0224^ea^ na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. kimassa dhajaggasmi.m? idha bhikkhu na heva kho su.naati -- ``asukasmi.m naama gaame vaa nigame vaa itthii vaa kumaarii vaa abhiruupaa dassaniiyaa paasaadikaa paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagataa''ti, api ca kho saama.m {saama.myeva (sii0)} passati itthi.m vaa kumaari.m vaa abhiruupa.m dassaniiya.m paasaadika.m paramaaya va.n.napokkharataaya samannaagata.m. so ta.m disvaa sa.msiidati visiidati na santhambhati na sakkoti brahmacariya.m sandhaaretu.m, sikkhaadubbalya.m aavikatvaa sikkha.m paccakkhaaya hiinaayaavattati. idamassa dhajaggasmi.m.
